title: Geometric sans with rounded terminus and distinctive e
content:
I'm trying to work out this one but am hitting a blank.  
It's not a long way from quicksand but that doesn't quite work.

Any bright ideas would be much appreciated!

Thanks  
Will

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175532im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GraviteCentricLogo_CMYK_4752.jpg)
